origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'ManufacturingAPI.get_production_process', 'description': 'This function provides the production process details for specified manufacturing companies.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'companyNames', 'type': 'LIST', 'description': 'A list of company names for which the production process details are requested.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'processDetails', 'description': 'A list of production process details for the specified companies.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 ManufacturingAPI.get_production_process, 它的参数输入如下: 'companyNames'是['GE', 'Siemens', 'Foxconn', 'Toyota', 'Bosch'].
